name: GIGS-D
description:
This game is a submission for GGJ 2020 which I've made with small team of my friends. 
More details: https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/gigs-d-4

A duo of Techno Agents "XD" come to the rescue, when a techno gig at a local club calls for rescue. 

Repair the music, fix the drinks, clean up the place and kick out all the unwanted guests. Keep the guests happy until sunrise! 

3D world filled with hand-drawn 2D characters, taking place in a futuristic dark club to the sounds of an original score by XD_band. The game is meant to be played in cooperation, using two Xbox controllers, but can be played by a single player.
